body.name: BDUSXYZ Pink Feather Lamp - LED Atmosphere Feather Night Lights Bedside Lamps for Mother, Girlfriend Home Girl Room Wedding Decoration
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 19 mins
features: ❤FASHIONABLE DESIGN: Lifelike feathers, not easy to fall off and fade, warm light beads for this feather night light adds a unique charm. Upgraded round plastic base with a heart pattern above is more beautiful. Energy-saving power saving greatly increases the service life of the product.

❤EASY TO USE: Two ways to connect, the first is directly with the USB light feather lamp, it will be placed on the bedside as a desk lamp. The second put into 3 batteries (AA batteries are not included), to be able to put it anywhere you want. There is an independent switch, more convenient to use. Make your room more cozy.

❤HIGH QUALITY: This feather lamp combines bright copper wire lamp and soft feather together. The copper wire is free to bend and can change into any shape you like. Small lamp beads are bright and do not heat up. Feather lamp bracket using baking paint process, the surface with rose gold plating, the overall more smooth and wear-resistant.

❤WIDE APPLICATION: This feather table lamp is compatible with various decorative styles of rooms and can be used anywhere you need romance, like restaurants, bedrooms, store windows, cafes, etc. We have a variety of colors of feather lamps to be able to choose from.

❤NO RISK PURCHASE: Since our products are made of lifelike feathers, there will be a slight floating hair when you first receive our products, which is normal and can be easily shaken off and will not affect the use. If you have any questions about the product or service, please contact us by email. We will do our best to make you satisfied.
body.description: BDUSXYZ LED Feather Night Light Artificial Feather : Not easy to fall off, not easy to fade, no static electricity, easy to clean. Lamp Beads: high brightness of small lamp beads, no heat, long energy saving life. Copper Wire: Waterproof coated copper wire, easy to use, copper wire can be bent freely. Base: Rose gold plating, wear-resistant, smooth, using baking process, better texture. Multiple Power Supply: The USB cable can support laptop, mobile power, cell phone charger (not included), car charger, etc. to make this feather light shine, you can also use the battery to light up this feather light directly, so that you can charge the reading light anytime and anywhere! Applicable Scenarios: Can be used in bedrooms, shop windows, cafes, restaurants, etc. Tips: Just received will have a slight floating hairs, after shaking off can be used without worries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp, I was skeptical at first about how it came in the box but once you separate all the feathers and get it plugged in? Pshh GORGEOUS at its best! Such a vibe <3 definitely getting another one! It’s so light weight and no funky smell and doesn’t shed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this is so pretty and feminine
reviews.reviewText: this is really really pretty and feminine. it's lightweight and uses batteries. there is a plug but i do not have cord for it. it was super bright at first but now it is a more acceptable accent lampe brightness. the feathers are pretty full, and for the price i think this is great for home or as a gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my granddaughter bedroom. She loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but super cheap
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I love pink and rose gold. This is super duper light weight in a cheap quality type of way. You do need to delicately position the feathers in the way you like best. It's cute for what it is, but I wouldn't order it again given the quality of the product itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Whimsical Feather Fun: A 4-Star Review for the BDUSXYZ White Feather Lamp (with a Little Twist!)
reviews.reviewText: While this feather lamp might not quite fill the bill for a grown-up office (those fancy ostrich lamps have a special, pricier charm!), it absolutely takes flight in a little girl's room! Here's why it gets a happy 4 stars:Pros:Fairy Tale Twinkle: The warm LED glow softly illuminates the fluffy feathers, creating a magical, dreamlike atmosphere. My daughter loves falling asleep under its gentle light.Fluffy Friend: The feathery texture is irresistible! She can't help but run her fingers through the soft plumes, adding a touch of whimsy to bedtime routines.Safe & Sound: Battery-powered means no cords to trip over or tangled messes. Plus, the LED doesn't get hot, making it safe for little hands to explore.Versatile Glow: From bedside lamp to nightlight, it adapts to different needs. Plus, it looks adorable on shelves or dressers too, adding a touch of whimsy to any corner.Cons:Delicate Delight: While well-made, the feathers are delicate and need gentle handling. Not the best choice for rambunctious toddlers!Overall:For a little girl's room seeking a touch of enchanting glow and feathery fun, the White Feather Lamp delivers! Just remember, it's more delicate than a grown-up office lamp, but its whimsical charm makes it a winner in the world of childhood dreams.P.S. Bonus points for the eco-friendly LED! Let's keep little imaginations bright while being kind to the planet. ✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my daughter’s room
reviews.reviewText: Adorable. I’ll be buying a second one.
